name: INBillPayee
desc: The entity that receives the proceeds from a bill payment.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init?(nickname: INSpeakableString, number: String?, organizationName: INSpeakableString?)
items.desc: Initializes a payee object with the specified account details.

items.name: var nickname: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: A user-defined name that identifies a bill-payment account in your app.

items.name: var organizationName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The name of the company that provides services to the user.

items.name: var accountNumber: String?
items.desc: A string to help the user differentiate between similar accounts.
